name: Racing Bus: Driving Big Car
description:
Racing Bus: Driving Big Car is the first coach driving game that will teach you how to drive a real coach bus. Driving a big bus and racing against another bus is a different matter with the race with an ordinary car. Very addictive and need special skills to drive a large vehicle.
- Detailed Coach buses
- Multiple Buses to select from.
- Adventurous & exciting multiple challenging levels.
- Manage your company, hire drivers
- HD and Amazing 3D Graphics
